article_title: Massachusetts Crime Lab Ex-Chemist Annie Dookhan Gets 3-5 Years
article_text:
BOSTON—A former state crime-lab chemist who falsified test results in criminal cases was sentenced to three to five years in prison Friday, in connection with a scandal that has thrown the Massachusetts criminal-justice system into turmoil.

In a soft voice, Annie Dookhan pleaded guilty in Suffolk Superior Court to 27 crimes, including tampering with evidence, obstruction of justice and inflating her credentials. She worked at a...
